FAQ
Can I buy an apartment with a mortgage through your website?

Yes, you can take advantage of mortgage offers from our partners. To do this, choose a suitable property, contact our manager, and we will help with the application to the bank.

Yes, you can take advantage of mortgage offers from our partners. To do this, choose a suitable property, contact our manager, and we will help with the application to the bank.
